title: Root and Shaw -  Super Psycho Love
author: SHOOT POI
comment: i love it when the psychopath & the sociopath lesbian hitmen fall in love....
2:40 root can't hide her feelings about shaw❤️ first time she realised falling in love with her 😍

In either season 3 or 4 Root is walking and talking to Shaw about keeping her alive. Shaw smiles and down grades the threat, but then Root gets serious  at Shaw for once telling her she should be afraid or concerned. Root tells her people who care about her are concerned. She should remember that. That's a rare time.when she was serious to Shaw! A GREAT SCENE from Root!
OMG !!!!! It's so great !!!! Love this song !! And please, don't stop making Shoot vid you're great at it :D

So good. Honestly, I know people debate whether they were doing the wild thing after the CIA safehouse, but the way Shaw walks over and gets on behind Root on that motorbike is like, Hell yes, whenever they could find an opportunity. 
Also, if you haven't caught it yet, this is a fantastic vid on them being badasses to another perfect song.
